cui_name: POLYCYSTIC KIDNEY DISEASE 3 WITH OR WITHOUT POLYCYSTIC LIVER DISEASE
reasoning: PKD3 is a subtype of ADPKD with estimated incidence of ~12-14 per 100k person-years. Using midpoint estimate of 13 per 100k based on epidemiological studies of monogenic kidney diseases.
source: Chronic Kidney Disease epidemiological data, genetic kidney disease incidence estimates
